question: [Practice] Francais: Indiquez which integer bin occurs most frequently a partir de l'histogramme.

qas.question: [Practice] Francais: Indiquez which integer bin occurs most frequently a partir de l'histogramme.
[Calm] Italiano: Riporta how many samples were used in total dal istogramma.
[Focus] Polski: Podaj how many entries fall inside the modal bin na podstawie histogramu.
